copyTrading.details: When following a user their trading patterns are copied with your own assets.
copyTrading.noEnrollMessage: You are only able to follow other users when enrollment is disabled.

enrollment.details: Enabling this feature allows other users to copy your trade patterns. This feature cannot be enabled when following another user.

trades.detailsUnfollowed: When following another user copied trades will appear here.
trades.details: These trades are copied from the user you are currently following.
